subject: Soccer
Police
Demonstrations and Riots
lead_paragraph: An Italian police officer accidentally shot and killed a soccer fan while trying to break up a fight between supporters of rival teams near a highway restaurant in Arezzo, the authorities said. Enraged, hundreds of fans later rioted in Rome, attacking a police station. Gabriele Sandri, a 26-year-old Lazio fan, was hit in the neck by a bullet while in a car at a rest area about 125 miles north of Rome.
